https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tYZeUSUbchUs31GRGqEfmZdDXfy.jpg Two customs officers undercover, Marshal Remo Signorelli and Brigadier Riccardo Riva, try to stop Massimiliano Grilli, a master of evasion. On one occasion, Remo meets his old friend Fulvio who suspected he had an affair with his then girlfriend and now wife. E io non pago - L'Italia dei furbetti
